page.shortlink: form layout camera image capture properties
page.description: Settings for configuring image capture behavior for an image.

description.p: Defines whether or not the user set the image by selecting an existing image from the Photo Roll, file system, or using the camera on devices that have a camera.

The *[ui:Image capture button HTML]* is used to define the content of the button used to open the camera, file system, or photo library to capture an image. You can customize where the button is shown by editing the 'Template' for this field and inserting this placeholder for the button in the template:
The *[ui:Image capture method]* defines what the user does to capture an image. The following methods are available:

item.name: TapOnImage
item.description: The user taps the image (or the missing image HTML if the image is missing) to open the camera to take a new picture.

item.name: TapOnAButton
item.description: The user taps a button to open the camera or select an image from the local file system or photo library.
